Question: Dongguan Hongcheng Electronics Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dongguan Hongcheng Electronics Co., Ltd. CES 2024

- High-tech enterprise specializing in the design, development, and manufacture of consumer electronic products
- ISO90001: 2015 and ISO14001: 2015 certified
- Introduced a laptop automated test line and high-speed SMT line for smart wearable products
- Imported MES system for efficient assembly, packaging, and shipment process control
- Annual sales volume exceeds 600,000 units
- Products include car central control screens, car charging piles, and tablets
- Located in Changping Town, Dongguan, Guangdong
- Exhibitor services and general queries available
- Contact number: +44 1514 531 904
- Operational hours: Monday to Friday, 9:00 am to 17:30 pm
- Show opening times: 10 am to 6 pm at Messe Berlin, Messedamm 22, 14055 Berlin, Germany
